project_descr: The overall objective of this project is to support the Government of Armenia in implementation of the selected provisions of the Government Decree #482 (21.04.2011) on the approval of 2011-2015 IBM Action Plan

outputs.output_descr: Modernization of Bagratashen, Bavra, Gogavan Border Crossing Points of the Republic of Armenia (MBBG BCPs)

The overall objective of the Project is the introduction of European standards of integrated border management at the Bavra-Ninotsminda Border Crossing Point on the Armenia-Georgia border with the ultimate goal to facilitate trade and transit and enhance the movement of people across the border.
